abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile talks about
            strengthened macroeconomic framework and enhanced trade
            competitiveness of Mauritius. The country faced ineffective
            business regulation, red tape and discretionary
            interventions, which had a negative impact on trade
            competitiveness. The programmatic Development Policy Lending
            (DPL) series was designed to support the government in
            undertaking comprehensive structural reforms. The
            programmatic series has consolidated the country’s fiscal
            performance, improved trade competitiveness, enhanced
            investment climate and empowered and assisted vulnerable people.
